title: Freestyle Cuts
results: Developing a mobile app, using React Native and Sails.js, for a hair and beauty startup with over 500 monthly active users.
Implementing features that will manage operations and interact with IoT devices in a semi-automated hair salon.

title: CreditSights
results: Used Python, Flask and Dash to develop a bespoke data visualisation web app that displayed company revenue information.
Processed data from spreadsheets using Pandas displayed the data on interactive graphs using Plot.ly. Proved much faster than creating graphs manually in Excel and saved 10 hours each week.

title: Health Shared
results: Collaborated with a team of developers in a healthcare start-up to implement a responsive web app.

Built a Java based data pipeline that requested data using the NHS API and updated a Firebase Realtime Database. Used Node.js to implement cloud functions that published user content to an open-access repository.

title: Just Eat
results: Provided customer service support for restaurant/delivery partners via phone, live web-chat and email.
Solved 80% of queries within the 5 minutes SLA, due to being able to quickly understand customer requirements.

title: Think Out Loud UK

title: Explore Learning
results: Full ownership of the 11+ course, providing specialist support to children taking the 11+ Exams. This involved lesson planning, teaching groups of 30 children, marking work and providing individual feedback to parents.
